text: Ma gu modongoohia hua bolo ma go Christ dela ne hihi di lede deenei, ga gowadu go gimaua. Di lede deenei hagalee ne hihi gi nia ink, gei ne hihi go di Hagataalunga o God Mouli. Hagalee ne hihi gi hongo nia baahi hadu, gei ne hihi gi lodo nia hadu manawa o nia daangada.3.3 Exodus 24.12; Jeremiah 31.33; Ezekiel 11.19; 36.26
